name: copycat cowl
notes:
a simple cowl that mirrors that popular beanie that's out there. [link text][1] just knits and purls with some simple increases to add a gentle flair to the base and encourage graceful puddling.

tip on the chinese waitress cast on:  do not count the slip knot as a stitch and drop it off before joining in the round.

for the stretchy bindoff go down one needle size.  here's a video:  [link text][2]


pattern has an update: so use v2.  here's all it changed: 
on the final increase round it should be (k**13**, kfb) not k12.


  [1]: https://www.ravelry.com/patterns/library/cmb-beanie
  [2]: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sbzeeg6xmwm
